SELECT O.*, C.name as C_name, C.description as C_description, C.idC as C_idC
FROM orders O LEFT JOIN carriers C ON O.carriersId = C.idC WHERE O.idO = #{id}

SELECT P.*, F.featName as PF_featName, F.valueF as PF_valueF, I.imUrl as PI_imUrl FROM productsOfOrders PofO LEFT JOIN products P ON PofO.idP = P.idP LEFT JOIN ProductImages I ON P.idP = I.idI LEFT JOIN productFeatures F ON P.idP = F.idF WHERE PofO.idO = #{id}
